pr_title: fix #2343 migrate reactor-tests' tests to JUnit 5

timeline.bodyText: let's not import enum values please
timeline.author: bsideup
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -483,7 +484,7 @@ public void thenCancel_cancelsAfterFirst() {
 		                            .then(() -> Schedulers.elastic().schedule(() ->
 				                            publisher.next(1L)))
 		                            .then(() -> Schedulers.elastic().schedule(() ->
-				                            publisher.next(2L), 50, TimeUnit.MILLISECONDS))
+				                            publisher.next(2L), 50, MILLISECONDS))

timeline.bodyText: could you please revert this change? IMO we should only import test util methods.
timeline.author: bsideup

timeline.bodyText:
the indentation seems to be wrong:

mixed tabs/spaces?
timeline.author: bsideup

replies.bodyText:
Will fix and propagate same kind of changes to 3.3.x and master (which may have more tests).
Thanks for the review!
replies.author: ericbottard
